abilities.name: Blessed Icon of Disease
abilities.rule: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly **DEATH GUARD** unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

abilities.name: Unclean Icon
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.
